dependent_to.name: ganglia
dependent_to.description:
Ganglia is a scalable distributed monitoring system for high-performance
computing systems such as clusters and Grids. It is based on a
hierarchical design targeted at federations of clusters. Supports
clusters up to 2000 nodes in size.
